entry.title: STEAM 白嫖（1）
entry.content:
steam中除了最基本的购买方法，还有代码购买法，代码如下：

steam://install/92《CodenameGordon》
steam://install/480《Spacewar》
steam://install/420740《恶果》
steam://install/311730《死或生5》本体
steam://install/531157《死或生5》DLC
steam://install/838380《死或生6》本体
steam://install/921590《最终幻想 纷争》本体
steam://install/1103750《最终幻想 纷争》DLC
steam://install/671210《最终幻想》试玩版
steam://install/803800《WIDECROSS》
steam://install/1097120《呐喊》
steam://install/1175970《胭脂红》
steam://instaII/442120《PinballFX3》
steam://install/566190《TheSearch》
steam://install/1161770《魔物娘农场》
steam://install/943700《魔物娘岛屿》
steam://install/258160《riseOfincamates》
steam://install/287630《议会》
steam://instaII/274980《lnfluent》
